summary: The diff implements the vast majority of the BlueStone Bank dashboard requirements. All seven REQs have corresponding implementation evidence. Minor gaps exist around the loading skeleton count for REQ-4 and some REQ-6 login page details being partially visible due to truncation, but overall coverage is strong.

missing_requirements.requirement: Loading skeleton is displayed while data is fetching — the skeleton shown in RecentTransactionsList renders only 4 skeleton rows, not 5 as implied by 'at least 5 recent transactions'
missing_requirements.reason: The skeleton loop in RecentTransactionsList maps over [1,2,3,4] (4 items), while the requirement states at least 5 recent transactions should be shown, suggesting the loading state should also reflect 5 rows.

hallucinated_features.description: Blur animation on the balance toggle — filter: blur(8px) applied via hidden-balance CSS class when balance is hidden
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirement AC specifies masking the balance as '••••••' on hide. The implementation adds an additional blur and opacity CSS transition that was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileSetupModal prompts for email and password fields during first-time profile setup
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request and requirements do not mention a profile setup modal with email and password collection. This appears to be an extra feature beyond what was specified.
